LanguageData.NY_hediff_ChickenwithMushroom.label: strength of chicken mushroom bouillon
LanguageData.NY_hediff_ChickenwithMushroom.descriptio: The blend of meat and mushroom repelled coldness and "cool"down.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_Dumpling.label: strength of dumplings
LanguageData.NY_hediff_Dumpling.description: It takes a full stomach to work or fight.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_EatLotusRoot.label: pores in face
LanguageData.NY_hediff_EatLotusRoot.description: It might sound ridiculous eating lotus roots turns their holes into pores on your face, but, urh, here it is.\n\n(PS. No pun jokes please it give me headaches)
LanguageData.NY_hediff_FishFlavoured.label: strength of fishy meat stir-fry
LanguageData.NY_hediff_FishFlavoured.description: Everything feels fishy now, so better be extra careful.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_GreenPepper.label: strength of green pepper meat fry
LanguageData.NY_hediff_GreenPepper.description: A fulfilling meal makes one feel stonger, but the stomach is a bit overfilled.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_LeekwithEgg.label: strength of chives egg stir-fry
LanguageData.NY_hediff_LeekwithEgg.description: Chives are known for growing fast, and eggs are cradles of life. The lifeforce is enhanced.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_MapoTofu.label: strength of mapo tofu
LanguageData.NY_hediff_MapoTofu.description: So soft and tender, the brain is almost turned into tofu, literally.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_MealLavishHigh.label: full belly
LanguageData.NY_hediff_MealLavishHigh.description: Increased blood sugar and concert of flavors on the tastebuds excites.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_PlumGingerTea.label: plum ginger milktea
LanguageData.NY_hediff_PlumGingerTea.description: The warm milk tea keeps cold out.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_PlumJuice.label: plum juice
LanguageData.NY_hediff_PlumJuice.description: The sour plum juice keeps one cool.
LanguageData.NY_hediff_RandomShreds.label: strips of fate
LanguageData.NY_hediff_RandomShreds.description: A glimpse into fate, from the dreaded dish.
